title: Suzuki Motorcycle expands retail footprint in Tamil Nadu
description: Japanese two-wheeler manufacturer Suzuki Motorcycle India Pvt Ltd has expanded its retail footprint in Tamil Nadu with the inauguration of fourth premium dealership facility in Coimbatore, the company said on Friday. The new outlet - Adharvaa Suzuki - is located on Avinashi Road, Peelamedu, Coimbatore.
